data.actual_result: the toast "Friend request sent successfully" still appears but Discord closes immediately
data.expected_result: You get back to your friends list
data.short_description: Discord closes after successfully sending a friend request via Add Friend button
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to your friends list - Tap the Add Friend button - In the field type the username of the person you want to send a friend request to - Submit and observe
